current.description: The specified current step, counting from 0. In the child Step element, the status can be overridden by the status attribute
current.description_zh: The specified current step, counting from 0. In the child Step element, the status can be overridden by the status attribute

direction.description: The specified direction of the step bar. Currently supports horizontal (horizontal) and vertical (vertical) two directions
direction.description_zh: The specified direction of the step bar. Currently supports horizontal (horizontal) and vertical (vertical) two directions
